response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. Considering its worth to you and the market value, I propose selling the product to you for $12,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between the value the product holds for both of us. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 12000}
